name: Royal Hajj
text: As a deeply spiritual and mercantile people, there is both a trader and a missionary within every individual of our society, and the same can be said of our religious leaders. One of them has undertaken a pilgrimage to a Holy City of a foreign religion, bringing with him a convoy filled with various exotic goods from our Malian markets. Not only has this journey strengthened our own religious fervor by demonstrating to our people the piety of a revered figure, he has also succeeded in selling off his merchandise, netting our treasury a good deal of profit.

choices.text: This bounty is all thanks to God.
